languages.text: {n}Губернатор мрачнеет, на лицо его набегает глубокая тень.{/n} "Вольный Торговец фон Валанциус убита! Немыслимо! Я приношу свои искренние, глубокие соболезнования, Ваша Светлость. Просто скажите, чем и как я могу вам помочь!"

{n}The governor frowns, and a deep shadow falls over his face.{/n} "Rogue Trader von Valancius! Slain! Unthinkable! Please accept my deepest and most sincere condolences, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Do not hesitate to let me know how I might be of help!"
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор мрачнеет, на лицо его набегает глубокая тень.{/n} "Вольный Торговец фон Валанциус убита! Немыслимо! Я приношу свои искренние, глубокие соболезнования, Ваша Светлость. Просто скажите, чем и как я могу вам помочь!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The governor frowns, and a deep shadow falls over his face.{/n} "Rogue Trader von Valancius! Slain! Unthinkable! Please accept my deepest and most sincere condolences, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Just tell me how I could be of help to you!"

{n}The governor frowns, and a deep shadow falls over his face.{/n} "Rogue Trader von Valancius! Slain! Unthinkable! Please accept my deepest and most sincere condolences, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Just tell me how I could be of help to you!"

{n}The governor frowns, and a deep shadow falls over his face.{/n} "Rogue Trader von Valancius! Slain! Unthinkable! Please accept my deepest and most sincere condolences, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Do not hesitate to let me know how I could be of help!"

{n}The governor frowns, and a deep shadow falls over his face.{/n} "Rogue Trader von Valancius! Slain! Unthinkable! Please accept my deepest and most sincere condolences, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Do not hesitate to let me know how I might be of help!"

{n}The governor frowns, and a deep shadow falls over his face.{/n} "Rogue Trader von Valancius! Slain! Unthinkable! Please accept my deepest and most sincere condolences, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Do not hesitate to let me know how I might be of help!"

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur runzelt die Stirn und ein tiefer Schatten fällt über sein Gesicht.{/n} "Freihändlerin von Valancius! Getötet! Undenkbar! Bitte akzeptiert mein tiefstes und aufrichtigstes Beileid, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Zögert nicht, mich wissen zu lassen, wie ich Euch helfen kann!"
languages.original_text: {n}The governor frowns, and a deep shadow falls over his face.{/n} "Rogue Trader von Valancius! Slain! Unthinkable! Please accept my deepest and most sincere condolences, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Do not hesitate to let me know how I might be of help!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gouverneur runzelt die Stirn und ein tiefer Schatten fällt über sein Gesicht.{/n} "Freihändlerin von Valancius! Getötet! Undenkbar! Bitte akzeptiert mein tiefstes und aufrichtigstes Beileid, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Zögert nicht, mich wissen zu lassen, wie ich Euch helfen kann!"

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur fronce les sourcils et son visage s'assombrit.{/n} « La libre-marchande von Valancius ! Assassinée ! C'est impensable ! Je vous présente mes plus sincères et profondes condoléances, Votre Seigneurie. Si je peux vous aider de quelque manière, n'hésitez pas à me le dire ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor frowns, and a deep shadow falls over his face.{/n} "Rogue Trader von Valancius! Slain! Unthinkable! Please accept my deepest and most sincere condolences, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Do not hesitate to let me know how I might be of help!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur fronce les sourcils et son visage s'assombrit.{/n} « La libre-marchande von Valancius ! Assassinée ! C'est impensable ! Je vous présente mes plus sincères et profondes condoléances, Votre Seigneurie. Si je peux vous aider de quelque manière, n'hésitez pas à me le dire ! »

languages.text: {n}总督皱起眉头，脸上掠过浓厚的阴影。{/n}“冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的行商浪人遭到杀害！这简直无法想象！请接受我最沉痛、最深切的哀悼，大人。如果需要我帮忙，请尽管开口！”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor frowns, and a deep shadow falls over his face.{/n} "Rogue Trader von Valancius! Slain! Unthinkable! Please accept my deepest and most sincere condolences, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Do not hesitate to let me know how I might be of help!"

traits.locale_text: {n}总督皱起眉头，脸上掠过浓厚的阴影。{/n}“冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的行商浪人遭到杀害！这简直无法想象！请接受我最沉痛、最深切的哀悼，大人。如果需要我帮忙，请尽管开口！”

languages.text: {n}総督は眉を顰めて、その顔に深い影を落とした。{/n}「自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスが！殺されただと！なんということだ！心よりお悔やみ申し上げる、陛下。お役に立てることがあれば、何なりと申しつけて欲しい！」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor frowns, and a deep shadow falls over his face.{/n} "Rogue Trader von Valancius! Slain! Unthinkable! Please accept my deepest and most sincere condolences, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Do not hesitate to let me know how I might be of help!"

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は眉を顰めて、その顔に深い影を落とした。{/n}「自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスが！殺されただと！なんということだ！心よりお悔やみ申し上げる、陛下。お役に立てることがあれば、何なりと申しつけて欲しい！」

languages.text: {n}El gobernador frunce el ceño, y una profunda sombra cae sobre su rostro.{/n} «¡La Comerciante Independiente von Valancius!. ¡Muerta! ¡Inconcebible! Por favor, acepte mis más profundas y sinceras condolencias, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No dude en decirme en qué puedo ayudarle».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor frowns, and a deep shadow falls over his face.{/n} "Rogue Trader von Valancius! Slain! Unthinkable! Please accept my deepest and most sincere condolences, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Do not hesitate to let me know how I might be of help!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador frunce el ceño, y una profunda sombra cae sobre su rostro.{/n}«¡La Comerciante Independiente von Valancius!». ¡Muerta! ¡Inconcebible! Por favor, acepte mis más profundas y sinceras condolencias, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No dude en decirme en qué puedo ayudarle».

languages.text: {n}Vali, kaşlarını çatıyor ve yüzüne derin bir gölge düşüyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir von Valancius! Son nefesini vermiş! Olacak iş değil! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, en içten ve yürekten taziyelerimi sunarım. Size bir faydam dokunabilecekse lütfen hiç çekinmeden söyleyin!"
languages.original_text: {n}The governor frowns, and a deep shadow falls over his face.{/n} "Rogue Trader von Valancius! Slain! Unthinkable! Please accept my deepest and most sincere condolences, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Do not hesitate to let me know how I might be of help!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali, kaşlarını çatıyor ve yüzüne derin bir gölge düşüyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir von Valancius! Son nefesini vermiş! Olacak iş değil! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, en içten ve yürekten taziyelerimi sunarım. Size bir faydam dokunabilecekse lütfen hiç çekinmeden söyleyin!"
